== GrantCheckResult

=== Properties



.ok: boolean;
True when the check passed


.request: GrantCheckRequest;
The request


.requestId: string;
User field for traceability of requests. The value was generated by the client requester.


=== Source

[source,typescript,linenums]
----
interface GrantCheckResult {

  /**
   * True when the check passed
   */
  ok: boolean;

  /**
   * The request
   */
  request: GrantCheckRequest;

  /**
   * User field for traceability of requests. The value was generated by the client requester.
   */
  requestId: string;

}
----
